snippet: The disclosure came as investigators scoured Mohammod Youssuf Abdulazeez’s past for ties to extremist groups.
abstract: Federal agents investigate background and activities of Mohammod Youssuf Abdulazeez searching for motive for shooting rampage at military sites in Chattanooga, Tenn; focus on seven-month trip he made to Jordan in hopes of discovering whether he had contact with or was inspired by Islamist extremists; seize his computer, cellphone and other electronics for forensic analysis.

byline.original: By TIMOTHY WILLIAMS, RICHARD PÉREZ-PEÑA and ERIC SCHMITT
byline.contributor: Timothy Williams reported from Chattanooga, Richard Pérez-Peña from New York, and Eric Schmitt from Minneapolis. Ranya Kadri contributed reporting from Amman, Jordan.

lead_paragraph: The disclosure came as investigators scoured Mohammod Youssuf Abdulazeez’s past for ties to extremist groups.

headline.main: Inquiry Focusing on Chattanooga Gunman’s Trip to Jordan in 2014
headline.print_headline: Inquiry Focusing on Gunman’s Trip to Jordan in 2014
